description:
Go bananas for these five titles this week! Welcome to this week's What to Watch. 'Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes' is in theaters, 'Interview With The Vampire' is back for season 2 on AMC+, 'Dark Matter' is premiering on Apple TV+, 'Doctor Who' is streaming on Disney+, and 'Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba' is on Crunchyroll. What will you be watching?

► Buy Tickets for Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes: https://www.fandango.com/kingdom-of-the-planet-of-the-apes-2024-234087/movie-overview?cmp=Trailers_YouTube_Desc
► Learn more about Interview With The Vampire: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/tv/interview_with_the_vampire?cmp=Trailers_YouTube_Desc 
► Learn more about Dark Matter: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/tv/dark_matter_2024?cmp=Trailers_YouTube_Desc 
► Learn more about Doctor Who: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/tv/doctor_who_2023?cmp=Trailers_YouTube_Desc 
► Learn more for Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/demon_slayer_kimetsu_no_yaiba_to_the_hashi
title: What to Watch: Planet of the Apes, New Doctor Who, Dark Matter Premiere, & More
